scripts.start:backend: npm run build:docker && npm run run:docker
scripts.deploy:template:full: npm run package:template && npm run deploy:template
scripts.create:changeset: aws cloudformation create-change-set --stack-name rk0-site --template-body file://./dist/output.template.yml --change-set-name rando --parameters file://./parameters.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.update:stack: npm run package:template && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name rk0-site --template-body file://./dist/output.template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters file://./parameters.json
